Melbourne.Palm Bay Magnet High School:
Palm Bay Magnet High School is a public high school located in Melbourne, Florida, 2,000 feet (610 m) north of the boundary of Palm Bay, Florida. It is part of the Brevard County School District.


== History ==
The school originally opened as Southwest Junior High School in the 1950s, in an area near what is now the Florida Institute of Technology and a historically black neighborhood in the south Melbourne area.
